item.title: Excessive leaf build up, 7th November
item.description:

item.title: Odd cul-de-sac need cleaning, 7th November
item.description:
The cul-de-sac is frequently plagued by significant litter, creating an extremely unhygienic environment. We routinely find discarded items such as used baby nappies, food waste, and various other refuse. Please add a public bin here and educate neighbours to use it. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Campfield Road, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
